content:
Hello everyone,

Please help me the snomed CT API query if you have implemented the same.

http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/valueset-clinical-findings.html

I'm trying to fetch Snomed CT Clinical Findings grammatically by calling the Restful API (Snomstorm).
The URI for the API call is https://snowstorm.ihtsdotools.org/snowstorm/snomed-ct/MAIN%2F2020-01-31/concepts/404684003/descendants?stated=false&offset=0&limit=10000

The issue i'm facing is the max limit we can fetch Concepts is 10,000. How do we fetch records from 10,001 to 20,000 and so on until we get all the concepts?

Thanks, Naveen
probably no one here knows the answer for the snowstorm question. you could try on #snomed but it really seems like a very snomed specifix question not one for the fhir community
@Rob Hausam can you please assist Naveen with his question? Thanks, Emma
@Rob Hausam can you please assist Naveen with his question.
@Naveen Mallela I would suggest asking @Peter Williams about this.
